name: SocialSellingforB2B
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Imagine waking up every working day with 5, 10, even as many as 20 new messages from qualified business leads. Would that start your day with a huge ray of sunshine? Our proven strategies deliver that reality using social selling for business to business sales. The web has massive business social networks that are the worlds best source of business to business leads. Top leaders and decision-makers waiting to hear from you gather among the over 650 million professionals on the vast network. Now you can learn how to use social selling to grow and leverage your online business network.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
